values: 切；割；剪；削减；缩减；删减；（用刀等从某物上）切下；割下；抄近路；穿过；切（牌）；倒（牌）；灌制（唱片）；录制（讲话）；划伤；割伤；开始长（新牙）；停止（不好的事情）；切换画面；停止拍片；剪辑；剪接；（从感情上）伤害；（与另一条线）相交；冲淡；稀释；划分（区域）；开除；除名；断绝（关系）；快速行进；突然转向；插队；去除（污垢、油污等）；削（球）；<美>逃学；逃课
切下的肉块；割下的一块肉；（尤指钱的）份；份额；（开出的）通道；（锋利物留下的）伤口；划口；（数量或尺寸上的）削减；减少；删剪；删节；剪辑；（录制的）乐曲；淘汰；伤人的话（或举动）
讽刺的；刺骨的；切得动的；像刀割似的

synonym.mean: 切割；相交；切牌；停拍；不出席
削减；伤口；切口；式样；削球

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 刀具，切割机；切割者；裁剪者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指表皮下面的组织受损，但没有破裂。但由于血流进组织，因而出现紫块。普通用词。
主要指伤口愈合而留下的伤疤。
指因尖利的器械的刺或割而造成的或深或浅的伤口。
通常指尖锐锋利的工具所致的伤口，多深及到表皮组织以下。可用作引申指打击或伤害。
通常指缩短时间、尺寸或过程。
多指对书籍的删节或缩短，删去不重要部分而保存其精华。
指省去应有的或后续的部分，从而使整体缩短。也可指缩短时间。
普通用词，指任何缩短而缩减的过程。
指粗暴地乱剪、乱砍、乱劈。
普通用词，使用广泛。指用带刃工具的切、割、砍等的行动。
指用刀斧连续猛力砍某物，以便砍断、切碎。

word_group.brief_definition: 中断(电话通话)；挂断；打断某人讲话；使隔绝
割断；切断；穿过；抄近路；挤进；刺穿
插嘴；切成, 削减；切割
淘气；无礼打闹；有某种阵容
割伤, 打伤；超车后从近处抢道

bilingual.source: Laser cutters can cut through metal and plastic.
bilingual.target: 激光切割机可以切割金属和塑料。
这个机器可以切割金属。

bilingual.source: He used a knife to cut the apple.

bilingual.target: 我们需要切割这些木板。

bilingual.source: He used a chainsaw to cut the wood.
Use a sharp knife to cut the vegetables.
The laser beam can cut through metal.
bilingual.target: 激光光束可以切割金属。

bilingual.source: The knar made the wood difficult to cut.
bilingual.target: 树节使得木头难以切割。

list.abstract: Cut（英 [kʌt]，美 [kʌt]），英语单词，作动词时，有切、修剪等意思；作名词时，有切口、理发等意思。短语搭配：cut off等。 Cut的近义词有shorten、bite、incision等。反义词有switch on、expand、uncut等。
Cut是计算机操作系统LINUX命令，表现为从一行上移除部分内容，选择性显示。

yingyinNormal.en: In just one week 8,000 workers cut out the 180,000 cubic meters of ice needed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在短短一周内，八千名工人切割出了建筑所需的18万立方米冰块。

yingyinNormal.en: Damn, paper cut. Nothing worse than a paper cut.
yingyinNormal.zh: 靠，手被纸片划破了。被纸割伤最痛苦了。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Cut her out of our lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？把她从我们的生活里隔离！

yingyinNormal.en: That's great. You can cut there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很不错，你可以停止拍摄了。

yingyinNormal.en: What happened? They must've cut it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么会这样？一定是他们剪掉了。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't cut it down. You just can't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们不能砍这棵树，不能砍。

yingyinNormal.en: They cut you open, your heart stopped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们给你开膛，心脏都停了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. I guess I can cut him some slack. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以放他一马。太棒了。

yingyinNormal.en: A third plant is then cut to mimic an attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再模拟被动物食用来剪第三株阿拉伯芥。

yingyinNormal.en: The rankings will also determine who gets cut.
yingyinNormal.zh: 排名也会决定谁会被淘汰。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you like to cut the umbilical cord? Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 准备好切脐带了吗？ 好了。

yingyinNormal.en: The desert alone would cut their numbers in half.
yingyinNormal.zh: 单单沙漠就能让他们损失半数人马。

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna cut her meat for her, too, there, Cal?
yingyinNormal.zh: 卡尔，你要帮她切肉吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Bill James and mathematics cut straight through that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比尔詹姆斯的数学理论克服了这些弊端。

yingyinNormal.en: So cut your horseshit attitude. Put your seat belt on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以给我改了这破态度，系上安全带。

yingyinNormal.en: The road didn't cut through the land like that interstate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 路并不像那条州际公路一样直接穿过沙漠

yingyinNormal.en: Good night. Cut.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚安。停。

yingyinNormal.en: Damn it! I cut my finger! Happy Halloween. No, really, I cut myself. Look!
yingyinNormal.zh: 该死，我切到我的手指了。万圣节快乐。我是说真的，我切到手指了，你看！

yingyinNormal.en: Cut it there! Cut! Check the tapes. We can talk now. She sounds incredible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里停一下！卡！看一下录像带。我们现在能说话了。听起来她很了不起。

yingyinNormal.en: Stop it. Cut it out. Cut it out. Okay, okay, I'm sorry, it will never happen...
yingyinNormal.zh: 别闹了，够了。对不起，我不会再…

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 低于…价格出售；切除；磨去…（尤指悬崖）的下部；下旋削；暗中破坏；底切；削弱；掏空
n. 切；割；削减；割下的东西；路堑；河道；插条；剪报

word_family.mean: v. 切；割；剪切；切削；把…切碎；切出；割成；修剪；削减；使隔绝；怠慢；不理睬；与…相交；停拍；停录；抽牌；签牌；削；使（药物；酒）掺假；符合要求

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 熄火；停止不前；切断；具有所需素质及才能的

sense_info_list.en: reduce the amount or quantity of; reduce in scope while retaining essential elements

examination_example.sentence: Companies can also optimize their own energy use and <highlight>cut</highlight> down on the cost of electricity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司也可以优化自己的能源使用，降低电力成本。

examination_example.sentence: Congress should look into doing so directly, by helping to finance PreCheck enrollment or to <highlight>cut</highlight> costs in other ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国会应该直接考虑这样做，通过资助预检入学或以其他方式削减成本。

examination_example.sentence: Students who do not need the extra training could <highlight>cut</highlight> their debt mountain by a third.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不需要额外培训的学生可以将他们的债务减少三分之一。

examination_example.sentence: Even if you regard corporate social responsibility policies as a waste of shareholders' money, things may not be absolutely clear-<highlight>cut</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你认为公司的社会责任政策是浪费股东的钱，事情也可能不是绝对明确的。

examination_example.sentence: Division of labor at home is seldom clear-<highlight>cut</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家的分工很少是明确的。

sense_info_list.en: separated into parts or laid open or penetrated with a sharp edge or instrument

examination_example.sentence: Our bodies know how to heal a <highlight>cut</highlight> or mend a broken bone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的身体知道如何治愈伤口或修补骨折。

sense_info_list.en: trim or reduce the length of (something, especially grass or a person's hair or fingernails) by using a sharp implement

examination_example.sentence: Parts of the ceremony involve ritual hair <highlight>cutting</highlight> and passing a candle around a circle of couples to bless the union.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仪式的一部分包括剪发仪式和在一圈情侣之间传递蜡烛来祝福结合。

examination_example.sentence: Some are up in arms over a proposal to integrate it within cross-<highlight>cutting</highlight> topics of sustainable development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人对一项将可持续发展纳入跨领域主题的提议表示强烈反对。

sense_info_list.en: stop or interrupt something

examination_example.sentence: The FSA says it is not telling people to <highlight>cut</highlight> out roast foods entirely, but to reduce their lifetime intake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国食品和药物管理局表示，它并不是告诉人们完全不吃烧烤，而是减少他们一生的摄入量。

sense_info_list.en: go through or across a place, especially in order to get somewhere quickly
make or form something by using a sharp tool to remove material
(cut something off)block the usual means of access to a place
a recording of a piece of music

word_usage.usage:
表示“减少；缩减”
cut指削减、缩减、裁减（尤指经费、开支、收入或生意规模）。
slash（常用于报章）指大幅度削减、大大降低。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 切; 砍; 分割; 割伤; 切口; 伤口
修剪; 雕刻; 剪裁法; 式样

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 中断(电话通话)；挂断；打断某人讲话；使隔绝
割伤；打伤；超车后从近处抢道

sense_info_list.en: reduce the amount or quantity of; reduce in scope while retaining essential elements

examination_example.sentence: Why did you <highlight>cut</highlight> the expedition short?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为什么缩短这次探险？

examination_example.sentence: Reducing waste by incorporating used materials into production can <highlight>cut</highlight> costs and decrease the price of procurement (采购).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将回收材料投入生产可以减少浪费、节约成本、降低采购价格。

examination_example.sentence: The agreement specifies that there is no formal distinction between developed and developing nations in their responsibility to <highlight>cut</highlight> emissions, effectively ignoring historical emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该协议没有正式且明确的指出发达国家和发展中国家在减排责任方面的区别，这实际上忽略了历史排放量。

sense_info_list.en: separated into parts or laid open or penetrated with a sharp edge or instrument
sense_info_list.zh: 切; 砍; 分割; 割伤; 切口; 伤口

examination_example.sentence: Because of his long-time connection with people in power, Marconi was unable to <highlight>cut</highlight> himself off from the fascist regime in Italy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于长期以来与当权者的联系，马可尼无法与意大利的法西斯政权割裂开来。

sense_info_list.en: stop or interrupt something
go through or across a place, especially in order to get somewhere quickly
make or form something by using a sharp tool to remove material
sense_info_list.zh: 修剪; 雕刻; 剪裁法; 式样

word_usage.usage: “把…切成两半”有两种表达方式：cut sth. in half或cut sth. into halves。注意介词后搭配的half/halves是固定的，不可互换使用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指表皮下面的组织受损, 但没有破裂。但由于血流进组织, 因而出现紫块。普通用词。
指因尖利的器械的刺或割而造成的或深或浅的伤口。
通常用于缩写单词、名称, 有时也指缩短演讲稿、小说、仪式、服装等。
多指对书籍的删节或缩短, 删去不重要部分而保存其精华。
普通用词, 指任何缩短而缩减的过程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 切; 砍; 分割; 割伤; 伤口

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: reduce the amount or quantity of; reduce in scope while retaining essential elements

examination_example.sentence: Organizations are always trying to <highlight>cut</highlight> costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 组织总是试图削减成本。

examination_example.sentence: They have deteriorated due to budget <highlight>cuts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于预算削减，情况已经恶化。

examination_example.sentence: The focus on academic "skills and drills" has <highlight>cut</highlight> deeply into recess (课间休息) and other time for free play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 聚焦于学业的“技巧和练习”已经大量占用了学生的课间休息和其他可以自由玩耍的时间。

sense_info_list.en: stop or interrupt something

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes a cat will walk on a phone and <highlight>cut</highlight> off the call.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候，一只猫会走在电话上，会挂断电话。

examination_example.sentence: The minister is also pushing to stop public transportation from being <highlight>cut</highlight> in ways that leave people isolated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位部长还在努力阻止公共交通中断，以免人们被孤立。

sense_info_list.en: separated into parts or laid open or penetrated with a sharp edge or instrument
sense_info_list.zh: 切; 砍; 分割; 割伤; 伤口

examination_example.sentence: Our clients usually want a special kind of stone <highlight>cut</highlight> in a special design.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的客户通常想要一种特殊设计的石头。

examination_example.sentence: A thin film of clouds was <highlight>cut</highlight> by white lines of thicker clouds that look like scars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一层薄薄的云被厚厚的云划出了白色的线条，看起来像伤疤。

word_usage.usage: “把…切成两半”有两种表达方式：cut sth. in half或cut sth. into halves。注意介词后搭配的half/halves是固定的，不可互换使用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指表皮下面的组织受损，但没有破裂。但由于血流进组织，因而出现紫块。普通用词。
指因尖利的器械的刺或割而造成的或深或浅的伤口。
通常用于缩写单词、名称，有时也指缩短演讲稿、小说、仪式、服装等。
多指对书籍的删节或缩短，删去不重要部分而保存其精华。
普通用词，指任何缩短而缩减的过程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 伤口; 切口; 剪发

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 切；割；削减；割下的东西；路堑；河道；插条；剪报

word_family.mean: v. 切；割；剪切；切削；把…切碎；切出；割成；修剪；削减；使隔绝；怠慢；不理睬；与…相交；停拍；停录；抽牌；签牌；削；使（药物；酒）掺假；符合要求

examination_example.sentence: Pack a bag, <highlight>cut</highlight> a cake, guess which juice container holds the most liquid, and much more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打包，切蛋糕，猜测哪个果汁容器装的液体最多，等等。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, resolving an argument <highlight>cuts</highlight> your negative feelings by half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，解决一场争论会让你的负面情绪减半。

examination_example.sentence: He said he would make sure that the company <highlight>cut</highlight> its use of plastic straws in half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，他将确保该公司将塑料吸管的使用量减少一半。

examination_example.sentence: It prevents people who are <highlight>cut</highlight> off from society falling victim to cheaters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可以防止那些与社会隔绝的人成为骗子的受害者。

sense_info_list.zh: 伤口; 切口; 剪发

exam_freq_info.chinese: 切; 砍; 分割; 切口; 伤口

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 割断；切断；穿过；抄近路；挤进；刺穿
淘气；无礼打闹；有某种阵容

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 切；割；削减；割下的东西；路堑；河道；插条；剪报

word_family.mean: v. 切；割；剪切；切削；把…切碎；切出；割成；修剪；削减；使隔绝；怠慢；不理睬；与…相交；停拍；停录；抽牌；签牌；削；使（药物；酒）掺假；符合要求

sense_info_list.en: separated into parts or laid open or penetrated with a sharp edge or instrument
sense_info_list.zh: 切; 砍; 分割; 切口; 伤口

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>cut</highlight> my finger and I'm trying not to get it wet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我割破了手指，我尽量不把它弄湿。

examination_example.sentence: I believe that we should recycle more paper, because we're <highlight>cutting</highlight> down too many trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为我们应该回收更多的纸，因为我们砍伐了太多的树木。

examination_example.sentence: The more trees that are <highlight>cut</highlight> down, the more oxygen we lose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 砍伐的树木越多，我们失去的氧气就越多。

sense_info_list.en: reduce the amount or quantity of; reduce in scope while retaining essential elements

examination_example.sentence: This can <highlight>cut</highlight> the use of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样可以减少用水。

examination_example.sentence: Brush your teeth at least twice a day, <highlight>cut</highlight> down sugary foods and drinks, and visit the dentist often.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天至少刷牙两次，减少含糖食物和饮料，经常去看牙医。

examination_example.sentence: They show them ways they can <highlight>cut</highlight> back on water use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们向他们展示了减少用水的方法。

sense_info_list.en: stop or interrupt something

examination_example.sentence: I could <highlight>cut</highlight> out a few of their activities, but I believe these activities are important for my children's future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以减少他们的一些活动，但我相信这些活动对我孩子的未来很重要。

examination_example.sentence: The after-school classes must be <highlight>cut</highlight> out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 课外辅导班必须取消。

examination_example.sentence: I'm sorry to <highlight>cut</highlight> in on you, but there are one or two things I don't understand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很抱歉打断你，但有一两件事我不明白。

sense_info_list.en: trim or reduce the length of (something, especially grass or a person's hair or fingernails) by using a sharp implement

examination_example.sentence: Chinese paper-<highlight>cuts</highlight> have been a traditional form of decoration (装饰) at the Chinese New Year for thousands of years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几千年来，中国剪纸一直是中国新年的传统装饰形式。

examination_example.sentence: Like a lawnmower that <highlight>cuts</highlight> grass, they get rid of (去除) all difficulties for their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像割草的割草机，他们为孩子摆脱了一切困难。

examination_example.sentence: Every day they were busy with <highlight>cutting</highlight> the grass and clearing the bushes（灌木）．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们每天都忙于割草和清理灌木丛。

examination_example.sentence: He started <highlight>cutting</highlight> classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他开始逃课。

examination_example.sentence: But soon, Dick became more interested in playing games with others, so he began to <highlight>cut</highlight> classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但很快，迪克对和别人玩游戏更感兴趣了，所以他开始逃课。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>cut</highlight> classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他逃课了。

word_usage.usage: “把…切成两半”有两种表达方式：cut sth. in half或cut sth. into halves。注意介词后搭配的half/halves是固定的，不可互换使用。
